import React, {Component} from 'react'; class HomeBottomNavBar extends Component { state = { currentType: null }; selectProfessionalsType = (type) => { let filteredProfessionals = []; if (type === 'all'){ this.setState({currentType: null}); filteredProfessionals = this.props.professionals; }else{ filteredProfessionals = this.props.professionals.filter(professional => professional.therapy_type.name === type); } console.log(filteredProfessionals); this.props.onProfessionalsChanged(filteredProfessionals); }; ActiveState = (isActive) => { const divStyle = 'iconsContainer'; if (isActive) { this.divStyle = 'iconsContainerActive'; } }; render() { return (
